snippet.title: Gameplay Deep Dive | Sherlock Holmes Chapter One
snippet.description:
This commented trailer will walk you through the game's key gameplay mechanics: investigation, open world and combat. Sherlock Holmes Chapter One is coming to PC, Xbox Series & PS5 on November 16th. Preorder now for bonus content: www.sherlockholmes.one

In this story-driven detective thriller, a young Sherlock Holmes struggles to prove himself as he navigates an exotic, dangerous island of Cordona in the Mediterranean to investigate the mystery of his mother’s death.

Follow us on social media for more updates:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SherlockHolmesGames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/SHolmes_Games​
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/frogwares/​
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/user/frogwares​

© 2021. Frogwares Ireland Ltd. All rights reserved. “Sherlock Holmes” is a registered trademark of Frogwares Ireland Ltd. All rights reserved.
